meanings.sent1: The train was nearing the station.
meanings.sent2: The sun was setting, and night was nearing.
meanings.sent3: The cake in the oven was nearing perfection.
meanings.sent4: The student's graduation was nearing, bringing excitement.
meanings.sent5: The storm clouds were nearing, darkening the sky.

meanings.definition: Coming close to in quality or quantity.
meanings.sent1: The two teams were nearing victory.
meanings.sent2: The price of the house was nearing our budget.
meanings.sent3: The taste of the soup was nearing heavenly.
meanings.sent4: The artist's skill was nearing mastery.
meanings.sent5: The number of attendees was nearing capacity.
